title: so yall just guna ignore the population having this problem?
body: I submitted this thread http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/7xLdQ1O2-out-of-my-controll over a day ago it has been seen by a Riot employ there are many other players haveing the same problem and yet it has still not been worked on, many of us are being afked from matches losing LP and getting leave buster when we havent done anything wrong and Riot has still done nothing to fix it, and im honestly really upset that i havent been able to play for 2 days because of it.

replies.body:
This is actually my fault for not responding to your other thread earlier :(  From our investigation into this issue, a lot of players are experiencing this issue and it seems to be a result of LoLReplay interacting oddly with League of Legends currently.  If you are running it, make sure to temporarily uninstall it to see if it helps resolve this issue.

Reply back and let me know if it is still occurring!

You replied to another query about this same issue, but still have not mentioned that you are looking into a fix for it.  So, I'm guessing since it is a third party application (that many people use) that you won't be fixing it, or that is definitely not a priority for you guys.

> [{quoted}](name=BADxW0LF,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cRv9nnFP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-19T23:24:51.556+0000)
>
> You replied to another query about this same issue, but still have not mentioned that you are looking into a fix for it.  So, I'm guessing since it is a third party application (that many people use) that you won't be fixing it, or that is definitely not a priority for you guys.

As LoLReplay is a 3rd Party Application that isn't supported by Riot, it's up to LoLReplay to resolve any issues that their application has with League of Legends. Otherwise, other replay services that may work better are replay.gg and SkinSpotlights Replays.

> [{quoted}](name=Sqkerg,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cRv9nnFP,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-20T00:21:43.075+0000)
>
> Why is your name yellow?

This should answer your question:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/mLb58XHz-the-wrenchmen-helping-solve-issues-one-post-at-a-time

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cRv9nnFP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-19T22:01:36.704+0000)
>
> This is actually my fault for not responding to your other thread earlier :(  From our investigation into this issue, a lot of players are experiencing this issue and it seems to be a result of LoLReplay interacting oddly with League of Legends currently.  If you are running it, make sure to temporarily uninstall it to see if it helps resolve this issue.
> 
> Reply back and let me know if it is still occurring!

thanks for replying im sorry i put you on blast with this thread.
Can you think of anything you have changed on your Pc prior to receiving the issues?
i haven't changed anything the only thing to change was the patch then my games would not load
